Medium-Style Media Upload

Experience seamless drag & drop, clipboard paste, and instant media integration

Try in Real Editor

How to Try It

🖱️ Drag & Drop

Drag any image file from your desktop and drop it anywhere on the editor below

📋 Clipboard Paste

Copy an image from anywhere (web, screenshot, etc.) and paste with Cmd+V

⚡ Instant Upload

Watch the progress indicator and see your image appear instantly

Features

🖱️

Drag & Drop

Drag images from your desktop directly into the editor

📋

Clipboard Paste

Copy images from anywhere and paste them with Cmd+V

📊

Upload Progress

Real-time progress indicators during upload

✨

Auto Optimization

Images are automatically optimized by Cloudinary

🎯

Instant Insertion

Images appear in your content immediately

🔒

Secure Upload

Server-side upload with validation and security

Interactive Demo Editor

Start typing below, then try dragging an image or pasting from clipboard...

Technical Implementation

🏗️ Architecture

  • • Next.js 15 with App Router
  • • ProseMirror for rich text editing
  • • Cloudinary for media management
  • • React refs for component communication

🔧 Components

  • • MediaUploadPlugin
  • • MediumStyleEditor
  • • ArticleComposer
  • • Cloudinary API integration

⚡ Features

  • • Drag & drop anywhere
  • • Clipboard paste support
  • • Real-time progress
  • • File validation & optimization

🚀 Ready for Production

This implementation provides a complete Medium-style media upload experience with:

User Experience:
  • • Seamless drag & drop
  • • Instant visual feedback
  • • No technical complexity for users
  • • Progressive upload indicators
Technical Excellence:
  • • Secure server-side uploads
  • • Automatic image optimization
  • • File type & size validation
  • • Error handling & recovery
